content.question: Describe your {{ divorceWho }}’s behaviour
content.explanation: Include examples of your {{ divorceWho }}’s behaviour which affect you the most, and the most recent incidents. If you think your health has been affected, state how it’s been affected.
content.fault: Don’t include examples in which you’re both at fault.
content.overTime: You can describe how they’ve behaved over a period of time or use particular incidents. Try to include dates if you remember them.
content.examples: Use as many examples as you want to, as long as it’s enough to satisfy the court that you can’t reasonably be expected to live with your {{ divorceWho }}.
content.warning: Your {{ divorceWho }} will be sent a copy of your divorce application, so you may want to avoid language that will cause conflict between you. You can discuss your examples with your {{ divorceWho }} if you want to.

reasonForDivorceBehaviourDetails.invalid: Provide at least 1 example of your {{ divorceWho }}’s behaviour

content.question: Disgrifiwch ymddygiad eich {{ divorceWho }}
content.explanation: Dylech gynnwys enghreifftiau o ymddygiad eich {{ divorceWho }} sy’n effeithio arnoch fwyaf, a’r digwyddiadau mwyaf diweddar. Os ydych yn meddwl eu bod wedi effeithio ar eich iechyd, eglurwch sut.
content.fault: Peidiwch â chynnwys enghreifftiau lle yr ydych ill dau ar fai.
content.overTime: Gallwch ddisgrifio sut mae wedi ymddwyn dros gyfnod o amser neu ddefnyddio digwyddiadau penodol. Ceisiwch gynnwys dyddiadau os ydych yn eu cofio.
content.examples: Defnyddiwch hynny o enghreifftiau ag y mae arnoch eisiau eu defnyddio, cyn belled â bod hynny’n ddigon i fodloni’r llys na ellir disgwyl yn rhesymol ichi fyw gyda’ch {{ divorceWho }}.
content.warning: Anfonir copi o’ch cais am ysgariad at eich {{ divorceWho }}, felly efallai y byddwch am osgoi defnyddio iaith a fyddai’n achosi gwrthdaro rhyngoch. Gallwch drafod eich enghreifftiau gyda’ch {{ divorceWho }} os oes arnoch eisiau gwneud hynny.

reasonForDivorceBehaviourDetails.invalid: Darparwch o leiaf un enghraifft o ymddygiad eich {{ divorceWho }}
